Headline: #156 LaSalle Temporary Reroute near LaSalle Street Bridge
ShortDescription: 156 LaSalle buses temp rerouted NB LaSalle Wacker Dearborn Hubbard LaSalle; SB LaSalle Kinzie Clark Wacker LaSalle due to bridge lift at the LaSalle St Bridge

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 307 N. LaSalle, due to a bridge lift near LaSalle Street Bridge.

Northbound buses will operate via LaSalle, Wacker, Dearborn, Hubbard, and LaSalle.

Southbound buses will operate via LaSalle, Kinzie, Clark, Wacker, and LaSalle.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Eastbound #81 Lawrence Temporary Reroute near Lawrence/Sacramento
ShortDescription: Eastbound 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Kedzie, Foster, Lincoln, Western, and Lawrence due to, construction near Lawrence/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Kedzie, Foster, Lincoln, Western, and Lawrence due to, construction near Lawrence/Sacramento.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
